name: Kyarukan: Super Break Down!!
overview: Kyarukan: Super Break Down!! is a simple tile-matching puzzle game with an erotic theme. The player is presented with a grid of tiles containing hidden pictures; the goal is to match identically-looking pairs in as few moves as possible, until all the tiles are revealed and the stage is completed. The player is given a certain amount of lives, which can be increased by revealing special tiles (pictures of a girl's face or the words "life"), or reduced by hitting a tile with a wolf on it. Other tiles that can't be matched include "open" (reveals all the tiles for a brief moment) and "shuffle" (changes the location of the pictures). Once a stage is completed, the player is presented with an anime-style picture of a young woman. The stages become increasingly complex, with bigger grids and more tile types; the girl gradually removes her clothes after each stage. There are three "scenarios" in the game, with three different girls; however, the gameplay remains identical in all of them.
